meanings.definition: Too small or insignificant to be valued or appreciated.
meanings.sent1: The amount of sugar in my tea was inappreciable.
meanings.sent2: The inappreciable amount of rain barely wet the ground.
meanings.sent3: The inappreciable size of the toy car made it easy to lose.
meanings.sent4: Her inappreciable effort in the game went unnoticed by everyone.
meanings.sent5: The inappreciable details in the painting added depth to the artwork.

meanings.definition: Impossible to estimate or measure accurately.
meanings.sent1: The inappreciable distance between the two stars made it hard to determine their exact position.
meanings.sent2: The inappreciable weight of the feather made it difficult to measure on the scale.
meanings.sent3: The inappreciable time it took for the snail to cross the sidewalk was comically slow.
meanings.sent4: The inappreciable impact of her words left a lasting impression on him.
meanings.sent5: The inappreciable depth of the ocean made it a mysterious and unexplored place.
